Rules of the Sea

The Goal is to sink the opponent's fleet. Both players take turns firing shots in an attempt to hit an enemy ship.

A hit on an enemy ship is marked with a bullseye and grants the player another turn.

Both boards and ship placements cannot be seen by the enemy player and a missed shot is marked with a dot

First player to sink all the opponent's ships wins the game!
